text: Roman Kapranov (born 7 November 1983) is a Paralympian athlete from Russia competing mainly in category T37 sprint events. Kapranov competed for his country at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in London, where he won two medals, including a gold in the 100 metre sprint. He has also competed at two World Championships winning three medals. ==Notes== Category:Paralympic athletes of Russia Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Russia Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Russia Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male sprinters Category:People from Dzerzhinsk, Russia Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the World Para Athletics Championships Category:Medalists at the World Para Athletics European Championships Category:Paralympic medalists in athletics (track and field)
title: Roman Kapranov
